query: 如图,在梯形ABCD中,AD∥BC,E、F分别是对角线BD、AC的中点,若AD=6cm,BC=18cm,则EF的长为()选项：['8cm', '7cm', '6cm', '5cm']
answer: 【解答】解:连接DF并延长,交BC于点K,∵AD∥BC,∴∠DAF=∠KCF,∠ADF=∠CKF,∵E、F分别是对角线BD、AC的中点,∴AF=CF,在△ADF与△CKF中,∵≥ft\{\begin{array}{l}{∠{DAF}=∠{KCF}}\\{∠{ADF}=∠{CKF}}{{AF}={CF}}\\\end{array}\right.,∴△ADF≌△CKF(AAS),∴DF=KF,CK=AD,∴EF=\frac{1}{2}BK=\frac{1}{2}(BC-AD)=\frac{1}{2}×(18-6)=6(cm)．
